commands.name: az sql server-arc extension feature-flag delete
commands.syntax:
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag delete --name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--machine-name]
                                                [--sql-server-arc-name]
examples: az sql server-arc extension feature-flag delete --name FeatureName --resource-group MyResourceGroup --machine-name MyArcServerName
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag delete --name FeatureName --resource-group MyResourceGroup --sql-server-arc-name MyArcSqlInstanceName

commands.name: az sql server-arc extension feature-flag set
commands.syntax:
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag set --enable
                                             --name
                                             --resource-group
                                             [--machine-name]
                                             [--sql-server-arc-name]
examples: az sql server-arc extension feature-flag set --name FeatureName --enable true --resource-group MyResourceGroup --machine-name MyArcServerName
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag set --name FeatureName --enable true --resource-group MyResourceGroup --sql-server-arc-name MyArcSqlInstanceName
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag set --name FeatureName --enable false --resource-group MyResourceGroup --machine-name MyArcServerName
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag set --name FeatureName --enable false --resource-group MyResourceGroup --sql-server-arc-name MyArcSqlInstanceName

commands.name: az sql server-arc extension feature-flag show
commands.syntax:
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag show --resource-group
                                              [--machine-name]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--sql-server-arc-name]
examples: az sql server-arc extension feature-flag show --name FeatureName --resource-group MyResourceGroup --machine-name MyArcServerName
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag show --name FeatureName --resource-group MyResourceGroup --sql-server-arc-name MyArcSqlInstanceName
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --machine-name MyArcServerName
az sql server-arc extension feature-flag show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --sql-server-arc-name MyArcSqlInstanceName
